name: Fates Foot
description:
This game was created in well under 72 hours for the Mini Game jam #115 : Noir

Story:
Opening in a detectives apartment, use the on-screen prompting to find objects in the room and unfold the story as you go.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Camera Movement
Left Mouse Button - interact with objects

Creators note:
Thankyou for playing, I haven't been able to do much game development in the last year or so, life has gotten pretty hectic. In a good way, very busy working and starting up my own small business.
I had a weekend with a little free time up my sleeve and saw the Mini Game Jam on again so I jumped at the opportunity to scratch that itch!

I hope you enjoy this as short a game as it may be and hopefully soon I will have more time to dedicate to bigger better projects!

Much love
BJ
